software.description: Generate Dockerfiles and Singularity recipes for neuroimaging with a simple command-line interface. Neurodocker supports a growing list of software, including AFNI, ANTs, Convert3D, Dcm2niix, FreeSurfer, FSL, Matlab Compiler Runtime, MINC, Miniconda, MRtrix3, NeuroDebian, PETPVC, and SPM12.
